item.title: [317]delta based- can someone tell me what this means when i run my source?
item.dc:creator: @bowzer bowzer
item.description:
@bowzer wrote:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2131) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:559) at server.main(server.java:124)

all i did is added this

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1622) { temp.addSkillXP(500, 18); } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1616) { temp.addSkillXP(1000, 18); } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1643) { temp.addSkillXP(2000, 18); } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1608) { temp.addSkillXP(3500, 18); } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1626) { temp.addSkillXP(4000, 18); } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1624) { temp.addSkillXP(5000, 18); } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1610) { temp.addSkillXP(6000, 18); } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1615) { temp.addSkillXP(8500, 18); } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2783) { temp.addSkillXP(10000, 18); }

and then thats what pops up in my run when i run my source any idea what that means?
